attributes.action: Make the date out of covid-19 lockdown a national holiday in the uk every year
attributes.additional_details: Support to all citizens for their commitment and support to the lockdown rules
attributes.background: Make the date out of covid-19 lockdown a national holiday in the uk every year

rejection.details:
We're not sure what date you want to be made a national holiday. We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Extra Bank Holiday when Covid restrictions are finally lifted: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563958

Introduce a new UK bank holiday to mark the day we went into lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556562
